message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $105?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower. How about we meet at $112.50?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll make one more offer. How about $108?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's as high as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
